actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 7 of the Earthquake Hazards Reduction Act of 1977 (42 U.S.C. 7704) to extend authorizations for appropriations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Earthquake Hazards Reduction Act of 1977 to extend, past fiscal year 1980, the authorization of appropriations to the President, the Secretary of the Interior, and the National Science Foundation which is necessary to carry out the purposes of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 7 of the Earthquake Hazards Reduction Act of 1977 (42 U.S.C. 7704) to extend authorizations for appropriations, and for other purposes.
